title: PYROGRAPHY PORTRAIT
desc: Sphesihle Hlatshwayo is a talented young South African pyrography artist known for creating detailed wood-burned portraits. He gained attention for his striking artwork of streamer IShowSpeed, which he personally gifted during Speed's visit to Johannesburg.

title: LENTICULAR PORTRAIT (Speed & Ronaldo)
desc: During IShowSpeed's visit to Zimbabwe as part of his Africa tour, a talented local fan artist gifted him this incredible one-of-a-kind lenticular artwork. Depending on the viewing angle, the image magically switches between a portrait of Speed and his idol Cristiano Ronaldo. Speed was left completely speechless and in disbelief, calling it one of the craziest and most creative fan gifts he's received on the entire tourâ€”highlighting Zimbabwe's amazing artistic talent!

title: CRACKED GLASS PORTRAIT
desc: SK Original is a viral South African artist renowned for his breathtaking cracked glass portraits, where shattered shards come together to form powerful, resilient images. During IShowSpeed's tour stop in Johannesburg's Maboneng, he gifted this custom masterpiece capturing Speed's chaotic hype and personality. After manifesting the meetup online, SK finally handed it overâ€”Speed was amazed, reacted energetically, and even signed it, calling it fire!

title: Nshima & Chipolopolo Portrait
desc: A talented local Zambian artist (a personal friend of @Unreal_Kev) spent two days crafting this detailed colored pencil portrait of IShowSpeed eating nshima while wearing the national Chipolopolo soccer jersey. Created as a fan gift ahead of Speed's Lusaka arrival on January 9, 2026, it captures his intense vibe in a stadium setting with a streaming mic. @Unreal_Kev pushed for recognition during the stream, but the artist remains off social media and prefers anonymity â€” no name or handle shared publicly.

title: 9-MINUTE FINGER-PAINT PORTRAIT
desc: Kellyzuluarts is a talented Zambian artist known for his speedy and creative acrylic works. He stunned fans by painting this vibrant portrait of IShowSpeed entirely with his fingers (no brush) in just 9 minutes! Shared ahead of Speed's arrival in Zambia during the 'Speed Does Africa' tour, it showcases raw skill and national pride as local visual artists gear up to welcome him. The piece highlights Speed's iconic energetic expression, adding to the wave of epic fan gifts during his Lusaka visit. ðŸ‡¿ðŸ‡²ðŸ”¥

title: RWANDA WELCOME PORTRAIT
desc: Rwandan artist art_valentin (active as @coudra.art_valentin_ on Instagram and @art_valentin_ on TikTok) created this vibrant painted portrait to welcome IShowSpeed to the 'Land of a Thousand Hills' during his 'Speed Does Africa' tour stop in January 2026. Shared via Instagram with local contact (+250793174951), it captures Speed's iconic energy and excitement from fans as he explores Rwanda. Part of the incredible series of creative gifts Speed has received across the continent! ðŸŽ¨ðŸ‡·ðŸ‡¼

title: IShowSpeed THREAD ART PORTRAIT
desc: Award-winning Kenyan thread artist Mamba Creatives created this stunning stitched (thread on canvas) portrait of IShowSpeed as a dedicated fan gift ahead of his 'Speed Does Africa' tour stop in Kenya (January 2026). Shared via video on X (republished by @kenyasgossips and others), it showcases his signature intricate style. Mamba successfully met Speed in person during the Kenya stream, presenting the artwork â€” fans are calling it a huge win for the artist and local creativity!
